summary: This mod replaces the original horses.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the original horses.
I scaled up the textures from 512 to 1024.

The textures are divided according to the following:
horse01.dds - Windhelm Stables horses
horse02.dds - Katla\'s Farm horses /Solitude/
horse03.dds - Riften Stables horses
horse04.dds - Whiterun Stables horses
horse05.dds - Markarth Stables horses


Install:
Copy the \"textures\" folder to your Skyrim/Data folder.

Legal: 
Textures can be used by any modder, i only need some credit.
Mention me as the original creator of the texture in the Readme.


Thank you for downloading this mod, enjoy the new horses.
author: zira
